metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21427 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component: Server: FTS). Supported versions that are affected are 5.7.37 and prior and 8.0.28 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-21427` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client - 5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-common - 5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server - 5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: leosilva> since 5.5 is no longer upstream supported and so far we cannot patch it, marking it as ignored.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.0 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
mysql-5.7 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.38-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1').
percona-server-5.6 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
